alert.note: Alert for Attala; Choctaw; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:10PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Choctaw, east central Attala and southwestern Winston Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 610 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Zama, or 12 miles southwest of Louisville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Louisville and Mcmillan around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Noxapater, Mccool and Weir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
